text: We are building a startup along these lines though is not exactly a white-boarding app. The platform allows to video conference and work on multiple documents like sheets, documents and slides in the same synchronized shared space. We have our free beta live if you want feel free to take a look here: <http://www.rendezview.io|www.rendezview.io> I would really appreciate any of your feedback. thanks!

text: looks very cool—for this kind of product i usually expect a video demonstration, since it’s a video product—is there one somewhere? i didn’t see one on the landing page
